name: XSmall
description: Perfect for ring boxes, small iPhone boxes, watch boxes, earring cases, and other tiny gift boxes. Delicate and precise wrapping.

name: Small
description: Perfect for books, mugs, cups, candles, small electronics (headphones, earbuds), and paperback-sized items. Quick and elegant wrapping.

name: Medium
description: Ideal for board games, shirt gift boxes, purses, handbags, blenders, small kitchen appliances, and standard gift box sizes. Enhanced presentation with premium touches.
features: Themed sticker set (e.g., Star Wars, Barbie)
Hidden "gift within gift" (candy or ornament inside) (+$6)

name: Large / Odd
description: For video game consoles (PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch), large board games, boots, shoes, blankets, and other large or unusually shaped items.
features: Reversible paper (two patterns in one wrap)

name: Extra-Large / Fragile
description: For 27" TVs and up, bicycles, mirrors, artwork, large furniture boxes, and multiple items together. Includes special handling for fragile items.
features: LED fairy lights woven into bow (+$12)
